B

BaseTag - Class in de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag
Class implements an easy access to basic RFID tags.
BaseTag() - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BaseTag
Default constructor for serialization.
BaseTag(FedmIscTagHandler) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BaseTag
Initialize a new BaseTag with the supplied tag handler.
BaseTag(FedmIscReader, FedmBrmTableItem) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BaseTag
Initialize a new BaseTag with the supplied tag reader and BRM table tag.
BaseTag(FedmIscReader, FedmIsoTableItem) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BaseTag
Initialize a new BaseTag with the supplied tag reader and ISO table tag.
BibliothecaMediaValidator<T extends AbstractMediaNumber> - Class in de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl
Implements a validator for bibliotheca tags which checks against a SISIS media object.
BibliothecaMediaValidator(Map<Integer, SisisMedia.BorrowState>, Map<Integer, SisisMedia.LoanAbility>) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl.BibliothecaMediaValidator
Initialize a new BibliothecaMediaValidator with required the information.
BibliothecaTag - Class in de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag
Class extends the ISO 15693 RFID tag with the Bibliotheca specific data model, which is based in the default DDM (Daenisches Daten Model) model.
BibliothecaTag() - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BibliothecaTag
Default constructor for serialization.
BibliothecaTag(FedmIscTagHandler_ISO15693) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BibliothecaTag
Initialize a new BibliothecaTag with the supplied tag handler.
BibliothecaTag(FedmIscReader, FedmBrmTableItem) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BibliothecaTag
Initialize a new BibliothecaTag with the supplied tag reader and BRM table tag.
BibliothecaTag(FedmIscReader, FedmIsoTableItem) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.tag.BibliothecaTag
Initialize a new BibliothecaTag with the supplied tag reader and ISO table tag.
BibliothecaTagValidator - Class in de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl
Implements a validator for bibliotheca tags.
BibliothecaTagValidator(String, String, List<Integer>) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl.BibliothecaTagValidator
Initialize a new BibliothecaTagValidator with the required information.
BRMReader<T extends BaseTag> - Class in de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader
Class implements a RFID reader that uses the buffered reader mode to read tag data.
BRMReader(Class<T>, ReaderConnection, int, int) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader.BRMReader
Initialize a new BRMReader.
BRMReader(Class<T>, ReaderConnection, int) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader.BRMReader
Initialize a new BRMReader with default cache size.
BRMReader(Class<T>, ReaderConnection) - Constructor for class de.thkoeln.bibl.api.rfid.reader.BRMReader
Initialize a new BRMReader with default cache size and RSSI limit of 50 dBm.
